metadata.description: School janitor Suguri has a second job...as a call-boy! When his work suddenly brings him to the door of a teacher from his school, he's convinced the whole affair will be unbearably awkward. But Suguri soon discovers that this is one client who loves to indulge his sweet tooth! Priceless Honey succumbs to sticky-sweet surrender in stories of naive love and indecent lust! Will faces from the past deliver peerless pleasure...or bitter disappointment? Which men will find the courage to take a bite out of the forbidden fruit of love?
metadata.name: Priceless Honey
